QuestData.Title: Ally of Dragons
QuestData.Description:
Your aid to the Dragon Isles has not gone unnoticed, $n.
The Life-Binder herself wishes to show you something as a reward for your service to dragonkind.
Go and speak to her at the top of the tower. All the Aspects await you.
QuestData.LogDescription: Speak to Alexstrasza at the Seat of the Aspects in Valdrakken.
QuestData.QuestCompletionLog: Speak to Alexstrasza at the Seat of the Aspects in Valdrakken.
